channel.title: Prop and Model Glitch
channel.description: Hello, Black Mesa Development Team and forums. This is my first post, but I'll cut to the chase. For some reason, the scientists ties are flopping around oddly, and same with the potted plant prop. The Tau Cannon's little tube connecting the two parts on occasion will start doing the same thing. Thank you, A concerned gamer. :slight_smile:

item.title: Prop and Model Glitch
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I believe this issues are already known to the development team, but thanks for the report.

Read full topic

item.title: Prop and Model Glitch
item.dc:creator: MySteveBling
item.description:
Hello, Black Mesa Development Team and forums. This is my first post, but I’ll cut to the chase. For some reason, the scientists ties are flopping around oddly, and same with the potted plant prop.
The Tau Cannon’s little tube connecting the two parts on occasion will start doing the same thing. Thank you, A concerned gamer.
